main.description: A claim for a future economic event(s) in reciprocity for an economic event that already occurred

action.description: Relates a claim to a verb, such as consume, produce, work, improve, etc.

provider.description: The economic agent who would provide the claimed event

receiver.description: The economic agent whom the claim is for

resourceClassifiedAs.description: References concepts in a common taxonomy for categorization

resourceQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the economic resource counted or inventoried

effortQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the work or use or citation effort-based action

triggeredBy.description: The economic event which already occurred which this claim has been made against

due.description: The time the claim is expected to be settled

created.description: The date on which the claim was made

finished.description: The claim is complete or not

agreedIn.description: Reference to an agreement which specifies the rules governing this claim

inScopeOf.description: Grouping around something to create a boundary or context, used for documenting, accounting, planning

resourceConformsTo.description: The primary resource specification or definition of an existing or potential economic resource
